column4: I got a Asus 1000HE netbook. I didn't think it would be, but it's the best computer I've bought lol
i hardly use my "real" laptop anymore
You should see my Compaq cq60-215dx :) Nvidia 8200M G, plays enemy territory Quake Wars quite well
well, I have a gaming rig to play games
I don't bother with wine. I just dual boot
yeah, it's not stable enough for a coding enviroment unless you are like me and just use notepad++ :D
Vim isn't bad, but notepad++ is a dream at finding errors
little hard to use via ssh :)
then again, I don't do my coding from ssh
I use it all the time
Like if I'm coding, I code on my laptop, then commit the changes via ftp
heh my coding can be anything from C++ to Haskell to Java to lisp on any day
All I code in is C# .net
at least you didn't say you coded in VB.Net
